attributes.action: Take sky news off air for misleading the public over brexit they're one sided
attributes.background: I'm sick off sky news doing poll's on a few people over brexit and claiming it's fact for how the whole  country feels,  and most people now would like to stay in the eu, being so pro remain and only putting mostly fake news with regards to brexit, as no one can be 100% sure what will happen

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's about something the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for.

Ofcom are responsible for ensuring broadcasters meet the laws about political impartiality.

You can find out more about their role here:

https://www.ofcom.org.uk/tv-radio-and-on-demand/how-to-report-a-complaint
